ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: Kunark: first impressions
ygData.msgSnippet: ... More speculation... I m not the best at remembering specific names (especially when they are similar), but it could be that there are say 4 reavers, each
ygData.messageBody:
> -----Original Message-----
> From: jay schultze [mailto:sartori69@...]
>
>
> Heh, I just spoke to a friend that also had to fight 4 black
> reavers before
> getting to the lord. I'm not sure about our fight, but it's possible that
> either the number of reavers you have to fight can vary. OR, it
> is a fixed 4
> reavers, and we got lucky and happened upon the 3rd incarnation.
>

More speculation...

I'm not the best at remembering specific names (especially when they are
similar), but it could be that there are say 4 reavers, each with a
different Lord spawn at the end. 1 Reaver the lord spawns when the first
reaver dies, another reaver a different lord spawns after the 4th reaver
dies, etc.

Or, the number of reincarnates is always the same depending on the reaver
but each reaver has a different number of reincarnates before the final
Lord.

Just a couple of guesses.

Anthem Dirgemaker
Level 51 Minstrel of Qeynos
Solusek Ro
